description:
This raster represents the yearly extracted volume of sand (mÂ³ / ha) based on data derived from the Electronic Monitoring System located on board of the trailing suction hopper dredgers active in the Belgian Part of the North Sea. For the mapping of the extracted volume presented here, it is assumed that the hopper of the trailing suction hopper dredger is completely filled during each extraction (i.e. filled at maximum capacity). 

Source: FPS Economy, Continental Shelf Service
name: Extraction volumes - gridded (Belgian part of North Sea, 2015-2020)
